column1: In  this  case  the  accused-appellant  was  indicted  before  the

High  Court  of  Colombo  on 
two  counts  under  the  Poisons  Opium  and

Dangerous  Drugs  Ordinance 
for 
having 
being 
in 
possession 
and

trafficking  of quantity 
less  than  1  gram  of  heroin.  After  full 
trial,  the

accused-appellant was 
convicted  by  the  learned  High  Court Judge  and
